korean: 선물로 세제 세트를 사 가지고 갔어.
방도 두 개에 거실도 넓고 베란다도 있더라.
친구가 직접 꾸민 거라고 하던데 센스가 좋아.
맛있는 음식도 많이 준비해놔서 배불리 먹었다.
치킨, 피자, 떡볶이, 과일까지 정말 푸짐했어.
다른 친구들도 왔어서 다 같이 수다 떨면서 즐겁게 놀았어.
사진도 많이 찍고 집 구경도 했어.
나도 언젠가 이런 집에 살고 싶다.
독립해서 내 공간을 갖는 게 진짜 부러워.
english: My friend moved to a new place, so I went to their housewarming party.
I brought a detergent set as a gift.
The house was really pretty and spacious, and honestly, I was envious.
It had two rooms, a spacious living room, and even a balcony.
I was impressed because the interior was also neatly done.
My friend said they decorated it themselves, and they have good taste.
They prepared a lot of delicious food, so I ate until I was full.
There was chicken, pizza, tteokbokki, fruits - it was really generous.
Other friends came too, so we all chatted and had fun together.
We took lots of photos and toured the house.
I want to live in a house like this someday too.
I'm really envious of living independently and having my own space.
I should save money and move too.
Thanks to my friend, I feel motivated.
